title: Did CDC ‘Quietly Update’ COVID-19 Deaths To Say Only 6% Are Legitimate?
subtitle: A rumor downplaying the seriousness of the deadly virus was promoted by a group of people that included U.S. President Donald Trump
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: The CDC "quietly updated" its COVID-19 mortality statistics in summer 2020 to show only 6% of previously reported deaths were actually due to the coronavirus, while the remaining 94% died from preexisting health conditions.
